title: Rek'sai ult adjustments *suggestions*
body:
I know this probably isnt going to make a difference but i have some ideas of how to make rek fit the goal of a predator from the void more acutely  and would love to hear what everyone thinks of them.

For the ultimate beig a point and click targeting its a litttle disappointing on how easily it can be dodged (why no dodgeable annie q) so i think instead of a target just being able to walk under/towards you avoiding the ultimate that as you fly through the air if at any point the target is below you on the way you strike them mid air but still landing where you intended also considering your ult warns everyone its happening via scream,possibly doing less damage than normal,still allowing for flash dodges ect.(no more 5hp Veigar walking at you unharmed)

Your a void predator but killing someone with your ult or your e makes no difference in the end it would be nice if finishing someone off would it would refund some cooldown such as Luxes ult perhaps max 50%, or possibly like Darius with temp cooldown reset.

Something that would be nice or cool is some form of stacking bonus for finishing off your prey with ult although might be overpowered or impractical just an idea e.g. ult gains 10 more dmg per execute delt with it.

Could be nice if finishing of your target with ult also makes the tunnel from the ult become and actual tunnel what more could a diver want.

Thank you for reading and pls give feedback on what you think.
